thread.title: Looking for Cavs Owner Dan Gilbert - people opposed to arena deal head to Detroit: Mark Naymik (Video)
thread.title_full: Looking for Cavs Owner Dan Gilbert - people opposed to arena deal head to Detroit: Mark Naymik (Video)

author: Mark Naymik, cleveland.com
title: Looking for Cavs Owner Dan Gilbert - people opposed to arena deal head to Detroit: Mark Naymik (Video)
text: CLEVELAND, Ohio - Delivering on an earlier promise, members of the Greater Cleveland Congregations is heading Detroit to find Cavs owner Dan Gilbert. Three buses full of members from churches across Cuyahoga County left Cleveland at 8:30 a.m. Tuesday morning....
